# Reference

The material for the tutorial session was developed using the following reference: 

1.  Silge J, Robinson D. *Text Mining with R: A Tidy Approach*. 1st ed. O'Reilly Media 2017. <https://www.tidytextmining.com/index.html>

2.  Hvitfeldt E, Silge J. *Supervised Machine Learning for Text Analysis in R*. Chapman and Hall/CRC 2022. <https://smltar.com/>.

3.  Kuhn M, Silge J. *Tidy Modeling with R*. O'Reilly Media 2022. <https://www.tmwr.org/>.
